caption.p: Signal, noise, and S/N ratios in the 50-member CanESM2 ALL LE. Results are for TLS ( A, D, and G), TMT ( B, E, and H), and TLT ( C, F, and I). The signal ( A–C) is the ensemble-mean trend in annual-mean atmospheric temperature over 1979 to 2018. The noise ( D–F) is the standard deviation of the 50 individual temperature trends. G–I show the ratio between signal and noise. Stippling in A–C denotes grid points where S/N exceeds 2.
